entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
